headline: Assessing Kenvue (KVUE) Valuation As Short Term Share Price Momentum Improves
summary: Why Kenvue Is On Investors’ Radar Today Kenvue (KVUE) has drawn fresh attention after recent share price moves that left its past 3 months return ahead of its performance over the past year, prompting investors to recheck the consumer health story. See our latest analysis for Kenvue. The recent 21.33% 3 month share price return contrasts with a weaker year to date share price return of 1.15% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of 14.49% decline, suggesting improving short term...
